dct_description_sm: Map shows metalled roads, village roads, other roads and tracks, district boundaries, ravines, hills, marshes, swamps, wells and villages.
2 bar scales on map, given in "English Mile[s]" and "Kilom√®tres."
"Very few of the Miji in Zanzibar island are compact villages, the houses are rather scattered over each district".
2 inset maps: Changa Island and Bawi Island.
dct_publisher_sm: Edward Stanford Ltd. 12, 13, & 14, Long Acre. W.C.
